    You can focus and blur the search input:

    • Ctrl-S Focus search input

    • Esc Close list tab

    Class: Epoch.Time.Area

    Defined in: coffee/time/area.coffee
    Inherits: Epoch.Time.Stack

    Overview

    Real-time stacked area chart implementation.

    Instance Method Summary

    • - (void) setStyles(layer) Sets the appropriate styles to the graphics context given a particular layer.
    • - (void) draw(delta = 0) Draws the area chart.
